entry.title: The Loquacious Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,719Chapters: 3/11Kudos: 47

Summary: Derek Hale didn’t expect getting lost in his own neighborhood to change anything, until the night he frightened a stranger in a dark alley without meaning to. Stiles Stilinski is deaf, skittish, stubborn, all sharp eyes and quiet panic, a notebook clutched to his chest, and a silence Derek doesn’t understand until much later. Soon Stiles is stepping into Derek’s messy loft, borrowing his books, drinking his tea, and filling Derek’s quiet spaces with the warm, steady presence Derek didn’t know he needed. Things begin to get tricky when Derek realizes that his erotic stories more and more star Stiles instead of the usual sexy female heroine. Then one day, Stiles is curled on Derek’s couch reading the manuscript he never intended anyone to see. Derek isn’t sure what terrifies him more: getting lost in the dark with no one to help or Stiles recognizing the pieces of himself hidden in the pages.

Author: StarStruckFears

Summary: Stiles was a monster, his mother had said so, screamed it even. So he does the only thing he can to save his parents from the monster he is. Stiles runs and finds a new home, one of death, one deserving of a monster. Aka Stiles is raised by the Argents and is sent with Allison to finish the mission Kate had failed to complete. entry.title: LIKE A WOLF HOWLING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,855Chapters: 8/37Kudos: 1

Summary: Twelve years after Adda's rampage, a now adult Eli Hale, along with Boyd and Erica's twin daughters, is working as a supernatural contractor; traveling the US and helping people out with problems of an occult nature. When the spirits of The Grey become frightened, and a powerful hunter targets the three, Eli must return home to Beacon Hills and gather the Hale Pack to once more defend their home. A mysterious and powerful hunter, a solo artist, travels the nation in an effort to destroy the supernatural threat to humanity. When she rescues an orphaned werewolf child, the delicate threads holding her paradigm together begin to unravel. Who is this child, really? Why is she so convinced that something bigger is at play here? And why, when she follows a target to Beacon Hills, do the streets seem so familiar? Or; The Parking lot is mostly empty. The neon sign which reads VACANCIES is buzzing, loud. In the car, Amanda and Ali say something back and forth, then look at you, and then speak again. You think that they resent you for dragging them out here, yet they won't leave.

entry.title: my heart sits on your lap
entry.summary:
Author: Beautiful_LBelle

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,019Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 46

Summary: Stiles wasn’t really sure exactly how he had gotten himself into this mess.    All he tried to do was wake Derek up at dawn so they could go scout the preserve and see if there were signs of a trespassing pack. This was the one occasion when the situation wasn’t actually dire, so it’s not like Stiles was worried or anything, he just… wasn’t expecting this.    He had tapped Derek’s shoulder, and instead of waking up like a normal person, sleeping Derek had grabbed Stiles and trapped him here.

entry.title: I Wanna Be Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Taintedtricked

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,168Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 36

Summary: Stiles never meant to fall for Derek Hale — the brooding, half-feral werewolf who grunts more than he talks and looks at him like he’s both a headache and a heartbeat. But somewhere between burnt coffee, pack crises, and late nights spent patching each other up, Stiles realizes he doesn’t just want to be in Derek’s orbit — he wants to be his. Derek’s spent his life building walls so no one can get close enough to hurt him again. But Stiles is persistent, sunlight in human form, and Derek’s starting to wonder if maybe it’s okay to want warmth. Secrets held too long begin to unravel, and somewhere between the noise and the silence, they find it — the quiet truth neither of them can ignore. “Maybe I just wanna be yours.” A slow-burn Sterek story inspired by I Wanna Be Yours by Arctic Monkeys — all coffee, comfort, and confessions you never meant to say out loud.

entry.title: You’re Safe, I’m Here
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,371Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 11

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight—too tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. “Dunbar,” he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn’t have, “you’re clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.”

entry.title: True Fate
entry.summary:
Author: Lalaith_Quetzalli

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,262Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 52

Summary: Alan Deaton is a man who’s always known what he wanted: power. He understood from a very young age that it’s those with power that make the rules (or break them without consequence). He even knew exactly how to get that power. That hasn’t stopped him from failing in his plans. Each and every time. It’s almost like the harder he tries, the harder he fails… But he will find a way to succeed, he will, and no Stilinskis will get in the way this time!

entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,043Chapters: 8/21Kudos: 124

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother’s social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate’s first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother’s work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they’re mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?

entry.title: Red Is Pretty (But So Is Blue)
entry.summary:
Author: sugareey

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,435Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 180

Summary: Happily ever afters don’t happen to people like Stiles. He knows he should be grateful that he even has a heartstring to begin with. But it’s been cold and dormant for so long. What good will come out of having a soulmate now—one who has basically ignored Stiles’ existence for ages? What could Stiles possibly need from a person like that anyway? * [Or: It’s only when Stiles starts singing love songs on stage that the Pack discovers his long-time hobby. entry.title: Jagged Edges
entry.summary:
Author: Eminet_2

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,565Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 146

Summary: In most timelines, Stiles and Scott looking for Laura Hale’s dead body has been the starting point for everything. But this time, Stiles doesn’t run into his dad. This time he gets lost and finds something much, MUCH more interesting waiting for him. (Sorry I suck at summaries)
